actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Manipulate Stone
actions.desc: If it is touching stone it can manipulate stone contiguous with its location to create one of the following:Rumbling Earth: One creature touching stone within 10 ft. of salamander is knocked prone (DC 12 Dex negates).Softened Earth One creature touching stone within 10 ft. of salamander is restrained by softened mud-like stone until the end of its next turn (DC 12 Str negates).Stone Armor Salamander's AC +2 until start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth/stone with o disturbing material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Stone Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Can climb difficult stone surfaces including upside down on ceilings with o an ability check.
